text:
The provisions of 
Chapter 12J, prohibiting the City from doing business with Burma, are hereby suspended. Until enactment of legislation withdrawing this suspension, the provisions of 
Chapter 12J shall have no force or effect and no City officer or employee shall enforce or implement the provisions of 
Chapter 12J. 
(Added by Ord. 287-00, File No. 001355, App. 12/22/2000)
